item.title: Making certain places wild and mute and unmute commands probelms
item.dc:creator: @killar63111 killar63111
item.description:
@killar63111 wrote:

well i wanna make people attack able at castle wars but im not sure how also i put this in to make mute commands but it don;t work usauly it work perfectily on my other source heres the code
this is mute

if (command.startsWith("mute")) { try { String mutedName = command.substring(5); int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer]; m.silent = 1; sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted"); m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute"); }

and heres unmute

if (command.startsWith("unmute")) { try { String muted = command.substring(7); int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted]; m.silent = 0; m.tempmute = 0; m.sendMessage("A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again"); sendMessage(muted+" is no longer permanently muted"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to unmute"); } }
i doanything wrong or do igot to add anythning thing somewere else

Read full topic
item.source: Making certain places wild and mute and unmute commands probelms
